bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume XV.] Michigan Papyri (P. Mich. XV).

series.title: Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia.

bibl.note: xi-220 pp. et 1 fasc. de 31 pll.

P. Mich. XV, 685-756. - Appendix I (pp. 141-157): List of all penthemeros-certificates which have appeared since the publication of Pap. Lugd.-Bat. XII. - Appendix II (pp. 158-171): List of women acting without a guardian.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, [Michigan Papyri. Volume XV.] Michigan Papyri (P. Mich. XV). (Studia Amstelodamensia ad epigraphicam, ius antiquum et papyrologicam pertinentia. XIX.)
Zutphen, Terra, 1982, 4°, xi-220 pp. et 1 fasc. de 31 pll.

P. Mich. XV, 685-756. - Appendix I (pp. 141-157): List of all penthemeros-certificates which have appeared since the publication of Pap. Lugd.-Bat. XII. - Appendix II (pp. 158-171): List of women acting without a guardian.
C.R. par Geneviève Husson, BibO 42 (1985) coll. 331-333. - J. David Thomas, JEA 72 (1986) pp. 222-223.
